blocks.name: bj-cbvexw
blocks.content: Change bound variable. This is to ~ cbvexvw what ~ cbvalw is to ~ cbvalvw . (Contributed by BJ, 17-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm bj-cbvexw(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
  -| wi(wex(s0, wex(s1, w1)), wex(s1, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wal(s1, w0))
  -| wi(wex(s1, wex(s0, w0)), wex(s0, w0))
  -| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  impbii(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))
  bj-cbvexiw(s0, s1, w0, w1)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0, w1)
  equcoms(s1, s0, wb(w0, w1))
  bj-cbvexiw(s1, s0, w1, w0)
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bj-cbvexw(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0, w0)↔ ∃(s1, w1))
  ⊣ (∃(s0, ∃(s1, w1))→ ∃(s1, w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1, w0))
  ⊣ (∃(s1, ∃(s0, w0))→ ∃(s0, w0))
  ⊣ (w1 → ∀(s0, w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  impbii(∃(s0, w0), ∃(s1, w1))
  bj-cbvexiw(s0, s1, w0, w1)
  biimpd(s1 = s0, w0, w1)
  equcoms(s1, s0, (w0 ↔ w1))
  bj-cbvexiw(s1, s0, w1, w0)
  biimprd(s0 = s1, w1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: bj-ax12w
blocks.content: The general statement that ~ ax12w proves. (Contributed by BJ, 20-Mar-2020.)
